questions.question: A close helical spring has a stiffness of 10 N/mm. Its length when fully compressed, with adjacent coils toucing each other is 400 mm.The modulus of rigidity of the material of the spring is 8 x 10<sup>4</sup> N/mm<sup>2</sup>. What is the wire diameter and the mean coil diameter if their ratio = 1/10

explanations.a:
Using the formula δ = 64WR3n / Cd4
where W = Weight of load, R = radius of coil , n = number of turns, C = Modulus of Rigidity , d = diameter of wire
we get d = 20mm
d/D = 0.1, so D = 200mm.
